title: Police investigating apparent accidental, self-inflicted shooting death: Coroner
content:
A man died after apparently accidentally shooting himself early Friday morning in York, according to Coroner Pamela L. Gay.
Police responded to the scene at a home along the 200 block of Chestnut Street at about 2 a.m. after receiving a report of an accidental shooting, officials said.
The victim's identify has not yet been released, pending the notification of family members, according to the coroner's office.
An autopsy has been scheduled for 8 a.m. Saturday. The York Police Department is also investigating the case.
Further information about the incident was not provided.
